text:
Michael B. Jordan wreaked considerable damage in “Black Panther” — on and off the screen.

A teenage fan was so captivated by a scene featuring a shirtless Jordan that she bit down and broke her retainer, her orthodontist shared on Tumblr.

“One of my patients came in for an emergency visit, because she snapped the wire on her retainer watching the movie when MBJ took his shirt off she clenched her teeth so f–king hard she snapped it,” the orthodontist, whose name was not listed, wrote in a post that’s gone viral.

Michael B. Jordan plays Killmonger in “Black Panther.”

Sophia Robb, 18, then confirmed on Twitter that she’s the fan the orthodontist was referring to.

“This is litterally my orthodontist and he’s the chillest person i have ever met even though he eXPOSED ME ON THE INTERNET,” Robb wrote.

Jordan, who plays the villainous Killmonger in the movie, has since offered to get Robb a new retainer.

“Since I feel partly responsible for breaking your retainers let me know if I can replace them,” Jordan, 31, posted to Twitter, along with a laughing emoji.

Robb seems to be taking the whole situation in stride. She’s retweeted and replied to a number of tweets referring to her story, and even updated her Twitter biography to read, “I’m the girl who broke her retainer over Michael B Jordan in Black Panther.”

“Black Panther,” which came out last month, has grossed over $920 million globally since its mid-February release, according to Forbes, and has won the domestic box office three weeks in a row.

The Ryan Coogler-directed film also stars Chadwick Boseman as the titular hero, as well as Lupita Nyong’o, Danai Gurira, Letitia Wright and Daniel Kaluuya.
